name: Not Enough Space (Bonane_Dev)
description:
A comfy Space-Shooter set on a tiny planet! :D

Fight off waves of space monsters, UFO's and Alien-Ships and protect your home from the invaders! But don't forget to clean up all the resources to then spend in the shop for new blasters!

The game was made for the Mashup Jam 2022 in a timespan of about 72h in a three-person group. 

We hope you enjoy the game as much as we enjoyed making it! :D
